summary:
Built and maintain a secure multi-tenant observability stack using Grafana OSS products (Grafana dashboards, Grafana Mimir, Envoy).

- Developed and released Terraform Providers for [Grafana Mimir](https://github.com/fgouteroux/terraform-provider-mimir) (Prometheus metrics) and [Loki](https://github.com/fgouteroux/terraform-provider-loki) (logs)
- Developed and evolved Golang Prometheus exporters
- Automated deployment and configuration of telemetry stack (Metrictank, Kafka, Zookeeper, Graphite, Grafana) and monitoring stack (Sensu, Moira)
- Upstream GitHub contributions to [grafana/agent](https://github.com/grafana/agent), [grafana/mimir](https://github.com/grafana/mimir), [grafana/terraform-provider-grafana](https://github.com/grafana/terraform-provider-grafana), [prometheus/prometheus](https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus), and [prometheus/alertmanager](https://github.com/prometheus/alertmanager)
- Developed automation tools in Go to enable internal customers to focus on their business

**Technologies:** Golang, Terraform, Grafana, Mimir, Prometheus, Kubernetes, Envoy, Python, Puppet, Redis, RabbitMQ, S3

Advanced automation and infrastructure self-service initiatives for Dev and R&D teams.

- Developed Python tools: f5manager (F5 configuration management), foreman-clush (shell command execution), and itlab (web interface for user creation)
- WSO2: Automated deployment and configuration in HA, developed Python microservice for monitoring
- Datalake: Automated deployment and configuration of multiple MapR clusters from LAB to production
- Developed Python tool for Spark application deployment on MapR clusters

**Technologies:** MapR, Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Puppet, Python, Elasticsearch, Java, F5, WSO2

Create and evolves the new fully automated and open platform. Help in the delivery of database, BI and applications products.

**Technologies:** Python, Puppet, Ansible, Linux

Infrastructure automation based on Vblock Systems.

**Technologies:** VRO/VRA, Cisco UCS

Extension of Veolia infrastructure on Amazon as part of a proof of concept.

**Technologies:** AWS, Python

Automation and management of servers configurations with Puppet for the deployment of the new production platform.

**Technologies:** Puppet, Beaker, Jenkins

Implementation of OpenStack and Puppet model as part of an automation process of ERDF infrastructure.

**Technologies:** Openstack, Puppet

Setting up a private cloud offers for web agency with HP Products.

**Technologies:** HP OO, HP CSA

Support and advice on the establishment of fifty IAAS deals accessible to businesses.

**Technologies:** HP OO, HP CSA
